Amoja beach resort

Where Luxury Meets Beauty

explore more

01
discover our resort

Oceanfront in the heart of Miami Beach

Welcome to our oasis of luxury and tranquility, where every aspect of your experience is meticulously crafted to exceed your expectations. Our resort is a perfect combination of distinctly designed rooms in a setting of rare natural beauty which only Samui has to offer.

Hotel location

4517 Washington Ave. Manchester, Kentucky 39495, USA

Reservations

Phone: +(406) 555-0120
Email: reservations@example.com

book your stay
  • Best rate guarantee
  • No booking fee
02
highlights

Destination for memorable experiences

02
highlights

Destination for memorable experiences

Beach & Pools
A 5-star hotel located near the airport and railway station; steps away from tourist sites like cave, hotel is ideal for leisure and business alike.

Sport & Fitness
Whatever you love doing, you will find an incredible array of choices at the our resort.

Culture
A 5-star hotel located near the airport and railway station; steps away from tourist sites like cave, hotel is ideal for leisure and business alike.

Entertainment
Whatever you love doing, you will find an incredible array of choices at the our resort.

04
DINING OPTIONS

Enjoy the taste of life

A symphony of taste will mesmerize you, ranging from cuisine to inspirational gastronomic creations. Each restaurant promises exceptional dining experiences to captivate your senses.
explore our restaurant
05
Spa & Wellness

Rebalance yourself in a timeless space

Discover our multidisciplinary approach across our medical, hydro-biontology, aesthetic, and wellness departments.

explore more
06
our Packages

Special offers

Extended Stay Savings
Save 25% for six nights or more
explore offer
Early Booking

Enjoy our offer, making your reservations
explore offer
Kick off Summer
Benefit from a 10% discount with a minimum of 3 days in advance.
explore offer
"Thank you for a truly amazing stay! Your hospitality is quite outstanding. The sports centre is also very good with excellent quality tennis courts. Hope to be back soon."
Annie Hebert Review from TripAdvisor
“We arrived early and we couldn't check but were exhausted. As soon as a room was cleaned and ready we were checked in at 10:30 not 3pm. This was extremely good.”
conie corleone Review from TripAdvisor
"Check but were exhausted. As soon as a room was cleaned and ready we were checked in at 10:30 not 3pm. This was extremely good service from the staff.”
jonny fontane Review from TripAdvisor
